clause.title: Temporary tiered seating, concourses and embankments

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Temporary tiered seating stands and embankments must be designed using engineering principles and constructed to provide for the safety of patrons and orderly means of evacuation in an emergency.

callout.p: VIC I5P1 applies to all places or public entertainment as defined in the Building Act 1993 and prescribed in regulation 206 of the Building Regulations 2018.
